evals.name: optimize-article
evals.prompt: Optimize this blog post for AI citations. It currently starts with 'In today's digital landscape...' and has no FAQ section. Make it GEO-friendly.
evals.expected_output: Optimized article with direct answer in opening, entity mentions, structured headers, and FAQ section added.

evals.name: optimize-product-page
evals.prompt: Rewrite this product page so AI will cite it. Current content is vague: 'Our amazing tool helps teams work better.' Need specific, factual content.
evals.expected_output: Product page with one-sentence definition, specifications table, specific use cases, named customers, and comparison with alternatives.

evals.name: analyze-content
evals.prompt: Analyze this article for GEO citation readiness and tell me what needs improvement. [user provides article content]
evals.expected_output: Analysis report with scores across 8 dimensions, specific issues identified, and actionable suggestions for improvement.

evals.name: fix-hedging
evals.prompt: This content has too much hedging language like 'might be', 'could potentially', 'some experts believe'. Rewrite with authoritative voice.
evals.expected_output: Content with hedging removed, replaced with declarative statements and specific citations where appropriate.

evals.name: add-structure
evals.prompt: This 2000-word article has no headers and is just wall of text. Add proper structure for AI readability.
evals.expected_output: Restructured content with H2 headers every 300-500 words, H3 subsections, lists for related items, and improved scannability.
